lead_paragraph: Federal prosecutors asked a judge Monday to bar Boston Marathon bombing suspect Dzhokhar Tsarnaev from seeing some of the gruesome autopsy photos of the three people killed in the attack.

headline.main: Feds: Limit Marathon Suspect's View of Gory Photos
headline.print_headline: Feds: Limit Marathon Suspect's View of Gory Photos
